attributes.action: Reclaim immoral MP's expense claims to cover a National tax rebate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whether legal or not, many of the Expenes claimed by MP's are Immoral and a breach of trust to Tax Payers. I suggest a consultation to have these repaid to the public purse and rebated back perhaps in the form of a council tax reduction for all.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
